thread.section_title: MOO.COM Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MOO.COM | www.moo.com | 6 of 147
thread.title: Emily Harding

author: Emily Harding
title: Emily Harding
text:
Was having some real problems with the trimming of my business cards, after two wonky batches I called up in despair. Brigitte was the adviser who helped me and sorted everything out, was amazing, helpful and knowledgeable, and my new and perfect cards were with me the next day. Moo would have lost my recurrent business had it not been for that call.
Thanks Brigitte!
